resources.string: Tap on \"+\" icon (top-right of the application) to create a new note.
After typing your text just tap on the device back key to save the note.
Long tap on any note and tap on the delete icon in the displayed options.
Long tap on any note and tap on the save icon to save the notes on the External storage(SDCard) of your device.
Tap on the app icon on the top-left or swipe from the left of the screen to access sync and label manager settings.
First login to your Dropbox or Google Drive account. \n Then long press on any note and select the cloud icon from the options.
Tap on the edit icon in the side panel to create new labels.
